jobTitle: RN Case Manager - Hospice at Home
jobDescription: Responsibilities: · The RN Case Manager, in collaboration with the entire Interdisciplinary Team, is responsible for assessing, planning, implementing, coordinating, monitoring, and evaluating the strategies and services required to meet a patient/family's end-of-life care needs. · An outcome-based plan of care is created and continually adjusted through utilization of the nursing process, relationship centered care principles, and holistic philosophy, assuring that the changing needs of the patient/family are met while facilitating a pain-free, peaceful, sacred death.· Demonstrates personal accountability for own continuous growth and development. Seeks out appropriate opportunities to enhance competency and improve performance.Requirements:· Current license to practice as Registered Nurse in Michigan required.· Bachelor's degree in Nursing or related field preferred. · Minimum one year experience in direct patient care; Hospice experience or long term care experience is preferred. · Visits private homes and/or facilities. · Work schedule is variable according to patient and family needs. · Works at times in an office setting. · Strongly encourage CPR certification· Valid driver's license..
